snippet: “Island Night,” a 12-hour overnight walk on Fire Island, hosted by the arts group Elastic City, is part philosophic dialogue, part poetic reverie and part nature walk.
abstract: Island Night, a 12-hour overnight walk on Fire Island hosted by the arts group Elastic City, is part philosophic dialogue, part poetic reverie and part nature walk.
lead_paragraph: “Island Night,” a 12-hour overnight walk on Fire Island, hosted by the arts group Elastic City, is part philosophic dialogue, part poetic reverie and part nature walk.

headline.seo: ‘Island Night,’ a Walk Across Fire Island
headline.main: Socrates on the Beach: An Island Walk
